channel.title: Hey, read inside for info - How To Make Magic Work On NPCS - [508 SERVER]
channel.description:
Hey, i've been coding my 508 server for a while, and always been thinking - How the hell do i code mage to work on npcs!
If you can help me out by sending me a TUT or codes or whatever, it'll be much appreciated! :rolleyes:
